application.doc: Retrieving the current administration pages root contents

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieving the current administration pages root contents
method.doc: To retrieve the current administration pages root contents with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the Administration Pages Root resource URI.

request.doc:
Retrieve the contents of the administration pages root non-recursively
GET https://{appliance_hostname}/wga/reverseproxy/{instance_id}/management_root/{id}
Retrieve the contents of a sub directory
GET https://{appliance_hostname}/wga/reverseproxy/{instance_id}/management_root/management
Retrieve the contents of the administration pages root or a sub directory recursively
GET https://{appliance_hostname}/wga/reverseproxy/{instance_id}/management_root?recursive=yes
GET https://{appliance_hostname}/wga/reverseproxy/{instance_id}/management_root/management?recursive=yes

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: type
param.doc: Resource type. Valid values are "file" and "directory".

param.name: version
param.doc: The current version of the file. This is the last modified time of the file. A numerical number that indicates the number of seconds since the Epoch (00:00:00 UTC, January 1, 1970).

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
